channel.description: Latest Care Quality Commission press releases and regulatory updates

item.title: CQC takes action to protect people living at Muscliff Nursing Home in Dorset
item.description: The Care Quality Commission (CQC) has taken action to protect people at Muscliff Nursing Home in Bournemouth, as well as rating the service inadequate, following an inspection in July....

item.title: CQC takes action to protect people at Bedfordshire care home
item.description: The Care Quality Commission (CQC) has rated Mulberry House in Luton, Bedfordshire inadequate and placed it in special measures to protect people following an inspection that finished in May....

item.title: CQC rates the Council of the Isles of Scilly adult social care provision as good

item.title: CQC welcomes improvements at Mid-Sussex GP practice
